findings.title: The lock-up contract lacks restrictions
findings.description: The unlock function lacks a time restriction on token lock-up, allowing any user to immediately withdraw tokens after locking, and there are no additional rewards during the lock-up period.

findings.title: The missing event trigger
findings.description: The contract fails to trigger corresponding events when modifying crucial variables or invoking key functions.

findings.title: Function Lacks Time Restriction on Token Lock-up
findings.description: The function lacks a time restriction on token lock-up, allowing any user to immediately withdraw tokens after locking, and there are no additional rewards during the lock-up period.

findings.title: The contract fails to trigger corresponding events when modifying crucial variables or invoking key functions
